DOC.brief_summary: To develop implement asthma control strategy inner city high risk population .
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Asthma serious chronic disease affect 12 million Americans ; 3 million child . The study part initiative , `` Developing Implementing State Local Level Educational Strategies Interventions Controlling Asthma Inner City High Risk Populations '' , release February 1993 National Asthma Education Program Office Prevention , Education Control .
